game.name: Overcooked
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play 휴대전화, Remote Play 태블릿, Remote Play TV, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Overcooked is a chaotic couch co-op cooking game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out in a huff.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Overcooked is a chaotic couch co-op cooking game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out in a huff.
